InternationalisationManager - Class in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.utils
Singleton class that creates it's own instance to handle all forms of languages to be used within the game Provides methods to get respective strings based on user language, will use the language provided by the locale If the locale isn't supported, defaults to English-GB

isComplete() - Method in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.room.Room
